text: Yolanda Memorial Marker or Yolanda Marker, Sta. Rita is a monument marker in the town of Sta. Rita in Samar, The marker was made and symbolize with a Hand carrying family, To commemorate for the victims of one the strongest typhoon on ever recorded Haiyan (Yolanda), a monster super storm to hit the central Philippines. ==Related page== * M/V Eva Jocelyn Shrine â€“ a ship wreck ashore in the coastal, city of Tacloban due to Typhoon Yolanda. ==References== Category:Typhoon Yolanda Category:November 2013 events Category:2010s in the Philippines
title: Yolanda Memorial Marker
